lead_paragraph: In response to an ongoing Freedom of Information Act lawsuit by the New York Times, the Obama administration on Monday declassified and provided a set of documents related to the government’s annual request for court approval for the warrantless surveillance activities authorized by the FISA Amendments Act.

headline.main: U.S. Discloses 2014 Warrantless Surveillance Program Court Documents
